headline: Verizon (VZ) Added 1.1 Million Net Subscribers in Q4-2025
summary: Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) is one of the Best Cheap Stocks to Buy Right Now. Verizon released its Q4-2025 results on January 30, which showed that the company added 1.1 million net new subscribers and expanded its fiber coverage to 30 million homes. This strong 4th quarter allowed the company to post 2.5% YoY growth in its […]

headline: T-Mobile Faces Verizon Lawsuit While Preparing Big Game Network Push
summary: Verizon has filed a lawsuit against T-Mobile US (NasdaqGS:TMUS) over alleged false advertising in recent marketing campaigns. T-Mobile is also rolling out extensive network readiness and public safety measures tied to the upcoming Big Game, involving large-scale infrastructure and capacity planning. For you as an investor following telecoms, this puts NasdaqGS:TMUS at the center of two very different storylines. On one side, the legal challenge from Verizon highlights how aggressive...
